short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover and find your favorite upcoming album releases! All information is taken from genius.com; no ownership claimed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new, simplified way to find and track new and upcoming music releases.

Choose any month from 2022-2023, and see new album releases along with your old favorites. With all of the releases in one place, viewing your favorite releases and discovering new favorites has never been easier! 

This extension does not collect, use, or distribute any of your personal data.
